sentences: Co-Chair Rawleston Moore distributed a draft decision text on the Special Climate Change Fund (SCCF).
Delegates addressed funding needs for developing countries to meet their commitments under the UNFCCC in the context of decision 5/CP.8 (review of the financial mechanism).
SOUTH AFRICA, for the G-77/China, said that, in accordance with the Memorandum of Understanding between the GEF and the COP, the COP and GEF should jointly determine the necessary funding.
The US, CANADA, EU and JAPAN supported maintaining the existing modalities for identifying funding.
On the process for the review of the financial mechanism, the EU, CANADA, JAPAN and US said that existing guidelines should be used.
The G-77/CHINA requested time for further consultations.
Co-Chair Moore invited Parties to hold informal consultations on these issues.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
